5. Why didn't the $15/hr min wage increase pass?
We passed it in the House. Then it ran into the filibuster in the Senate and Mitch McConnell. There were not enough votes to pass it in the Senate. So while it was not in this bill, we are not giving up and will keep at it. #vtpoli

4. What is the deal with the checks for parents?

This bill includes an expanded child tax credit! This means parents will receive $300 per month per child under 6 ($3,600 total). For children 6-16, parents will receive $250 per month per child ($3000 total). #vtpoli

3. Will this help incarcerated people? 
Yes. They will receive stimulus checks as they did in the last two rounds of stimulus. We allocated a lot more $ for vaccine distribution- states should follow the CDC guidelines and vaccinate incarcerated Americans to prevent outbreaks.

2. When will I get my stimulus check? 

 Some ppl are already seeing a notice of a pending direct deposit in their bank accounts. When people receive a check will vary. If you did not set up direct deposit for your tax return, you will receive the stimulus check by mail.
